alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:39PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Box Elder and north central Tooele Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 237 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Knolls, or 39 miles east of Wendover, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar and observation indicated. A wind gust of 53 mph was observed at 2:25 PM on I-80 near mile post 30. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knolls and Utah Test and Training Range North. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 34 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
